params._data: - function selector to be called on the airdropping contract
params._nftAirdrop: - address of the used claiming nft in the drop
params._nftAirdropId: - id of the used claiming nft in the drop
params._nftContract: - contract address of the target nft of the drop
params._nftId: - id of the target nft of the drop

pullAirdrop(address,uint256,address,byte.notice: this function initiates a flashloan to pull an airdrop from a tartget contract
